contents.displayName: Man in the Arena: Tom Brady
contents.description: After 21 seasons in the NFL, Tom Brady shares a personal account of his Super Bowl appearances, and deconstructs the milestones of his legendary career. Each episode explores the pivotal moments in Tom Brady’s life on and off the field.

contents.displayName: Tom Brady texts Shedeur Sanders: Use draft slide 'as motivation'

contents.displayName: Bill Belichick explains why he bribed staffers to bat down Brady's passes
contents.subtitle: Bill Belichick says he paid staffers $100 to bat down Tom Brady's passes at practice, but Brady would outbid him by offering $200 if none were knocked down.

contents.displayName: Bill Belichick to McAfee: Tom Brady and I were a good match on Pats
contents.subtitle: Bill Belichick tells Pat McAfee that Tom Brady was a great match for the Patriots' winning culture.
